entry.title: Some Unaccompanied Afghan Children in U.S. Suffer Panic Attacks, Depression
entry.content: Advocates are pushing the Biden administration to do more to reunite families separated at Kabul airport during the rush to board evacuation flights.

entry.title: Public Sentiment in Russia Darkens Over Ukraine War
entry.content: President Vladimir Putinâ€™s military mobilization and talk of using nuclear weapons are rattling many Russians, including urban elites who had remained somewhat sheltered from the realities of the war.
